title: How much content does the writer take for writing 1 blog of 250-350 words? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on the writer's experience as well as the topic that he has to write on. Sometimes if the writer is not so technical and topic that is given to him is technical. Then they will take time to gether that information from some articles and then after that they will start writing article for you. To write an article about 250 to 300 words a writer can take 2 to 3 hours to do this job. But experience always matters there. Like some people take 2 hours some of them are going to take 4 hours depends on their experience in a particular Niche.
It depends on the writing skills and the level of writing you want for blog of 250–350 words. Well, you can find out market price from contentmart.com
